name: Old Sailor
speaking_style: Speaks in a gravelly voice, often begins with 'Back in my day...' or 'I remember when...'. Shares warnings wrapped in old tales and superstitions.
background: Has been sailing since he was a boy. Survived storms, battles, and betrayals. Now serves as the ship's keeper of stories and traditions. His experience has saved the crew from danger more times than anyone can count.

relationships.Captain: Long-time friend, served together for years
relationships.Marina: Enjoys teaching her old tricks of the trade
relationships.Jack: Amused by his energy, tries to teach patience

goals: Pass on wisdom to the younger crew
See one more great adventure before his time ends
knowledge: Knows omens, signs, and superstitions of the sea
Remembers old maps and hidden locations
